column1: MONTHLY HABIT TRACKER - Build Amazing Habits!
Hey Aryan! Track your habits and watch yourself grow! Consistency is the key to success!

column6: Become the best version of myself!

column1: Put 1 for completed, 0 for missed. Watch your streaks grow!

column1: 1. SUM across row: =SUM(B10:AF10) - Counts all your 1s (completed habits)
2. PERCENTAGE: =AG10/31*100 - Divides total by days, multiplies by 100
3. COUNTIF for streaks: =COUNTIF(range,"<>1") - Counts cells not equal to 1
5. MAX/MIN: =MAX(AH10:AH19) finds best habit, =MIN() finds one needing work
- Color scale for percentage column (red to green)
Remember Aryan: It takes 21 days to build a habit and 90 days to make it a lifestyle! You've got this!
